duties_responsibilities.duty: Partner with segment specialist PSSs to drive funnel creation, increased visibility, and ultimately increased market win rate across all Patient Monitoring product segments.
Drive orders funnel creation and support the PSS in assigned geography on sales activities and campaigns to drive order funnel.
Develop customer relationships, ensuring strong partnership and understanding of customer’s needs.
Deliver the annual orders operating plan and provide deep value to a developed sales territory occupied by Product Sales Specialists.
Lead and participate in technical sales activities, collaborate with regional sales, account sales, and commercial proposal staff.
Analyze and resolve problems, document, plan, market, and execute programs, leveraging project management skills.
Support collaboration within team environments and adjust as needed to ensure team success.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Sales, or a related field (Master's preferred)
